notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: XZ and ML conceived and designed the study. YH, XD, ZH, YW, SZ, JL, YY, JC, SA, and CC performed the experiments. XZ, CG and YXY collected and analyzed the clinical information. YH, XD, ZH, XZ, ZS and ML analyzed the data. ML, JW, XZ, HT, JC, YY, and HG contributed reagents, materials and analysis tools. YH, XZ, and ML wrote the paper. All authors discussed the results, provided reviews and revisions to the manuscript and ultimately approved the final version for submission and publication. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
